<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adds Generate resolution notes, Summarize record and Chat summarization skills (marked active and discoverable) to the promoted skills table</description>
        <name>Adds  promoted skills</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var napPlatformContextProfileSysId = "e93cab98c7c03110b65579a988c260c4";

var resolution_notes = "abe04b5f1b307110f9ddb888cc4bcbc7";
var summarize_record = "2fa9662a1bb83110f9ddb888cc4bcbab";
var chat_summarization = "f7c4b076a3303110f066d78446fcda4c";

var skillGr = new GlideRecord("sys_gen_ai_skill_config");
skillGr.addQuery("active", true);
skillGr.addQuery("discoverable", true);
skillGr.addQuery("skill_id=" + resolution_notes + "^ORskill_id=" + summarize_record + "^ORskill_id=" + chat_summarization);
skillGr.query();

var contextProfileSkillGr = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_context_profile_promoted_skill");

while (skillGr.next()) {
    if (!recordExists(napPlatformContextProfileSysId, skillGr.skill_id)) {
        contextProfileSkillGr.initialize();
        contextProfileSkillGr.context_profile = napPlatformContextProfileSysId;
        contextProfileSkillGr.skill_id = skillGr.skill_id;
        contextProfileSkillGr.insert();
    }
}

function recordExists(contextProfileSysId, skillSysId) {
    var contextProfileSkillGr = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_context_profile_promoted_skill");
    contextProfileSkillGr.addQuery('context_profile', contextProfileSysId);
    contextProfileSkillGr.addQuery('skill_id', skillSysId);
    contextProfileSkillGr.setLimit(1);
    contextProfileSkillGr.query();
    return contextProfileSkillGr.next();
}]]></script>
